About me

Hi, I'm Viktoryia – HTML coder from Minsk. I'm interested in web-development and everything connected with it.

I completed the courses "HTML5 coding" in IT-INCUBATOR and I'm studying at courses "Junior Software Engineer in JavaScript/Front-end" in The Rolling Scopes.

Ready to implement excellent projects with wonderful people - open my CV
